item.description:
Great International Beer Festival

Hi Friends,

This weekend, Saturday November 10th, the 11th International Beer Festival is going to be held at the Rhode Island Convention Center in Providence from 6:30 p.m. - 10:00 p.m. Tickets are $35 and will allow you an UNLIMITED SAMPLING of more than 250 brews, Live MUSIC, FOOD and MUCH MORE!

This sounds like a really fun event for us to meetup at and get to know each other. Please let me know if you are interested in attending at the earliest, because there is much talk about the show being sold out. Thanks!

Saad.
item.name: Great International Beer Festival
